#!/usr/bin/guestfish -f # (C) Copyright 2015 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P. # # PLanscript to completely generalises an OE Volume # without retaining any user configuration # This script is provided as an input to the generalization script # This script performs the following jobs: # 1. Launches guestfish # 2. Mount the /dev/sda5 partition of the mapped disk # 3. Removes the old jumpstrt and useropts file # 4. Creates dummy "jumpstrt and useropts" files and is zipped # 5. Removes state.tgz file. # 6. Fixes the boot.cfg file and exit #
#launch the shell run #mount the filesystem mount /dev/sda5 /
#create new jumpstrt and useropts files and compress them to the local disk touch /useropts compress-out gzip /useropts /tmp_dir/useropts.gz touch /jumpstrt compress-out gzip /jumpstrt /tmp_dir/jumpstrt.gz rm /useropts rm /jumpstrt
#remove old useropts and jumpstrt file rm /useropts.gz rm /jumpstrt.gz
#copy them to the virtual disk copy-in /tmp_dir/useropts.gz / copy-in /tmp_dir/jumpstrt.gz /
#remove the state.gz file rm-f /state.tgz
#Copy the boot.cfg to local machine copy-out /boot.cfg /tmp_dir
#Manipulate the boot.cfg
<!if [ ! -z `grep "installerDiskDumpSlotSize=" /tmp_dir/boot.cfg` ]; then grep "installerDiskDumpSlotSize=" /tmp_dir/boot.cfg |awk -F "installerDiskDumpSlotSize=" {'print $2'} | awk {'print $1'} > /tmp_dir/installerDiskDumpSlotSizeValue; sed -e "/^kernelopt=/ckernelopt= "installerDiskDumpSlotSize=`cat /tmp_dir/installerDiskDumpSlotSizeValue`"" /tmp_dir/boot.cfg >/tmp_dir/boot.cfg.new ; else sed -e '/^kernelopt=/ckernelopt=' /tmp_dir/boot.cfg > "/tmp_dir/boot.cfg.new" ;fi !sed -e '/^modules=/{ s,--- state.tgz,, }' /tmp_dir/boot.cfg.new > "/tmp_dir/boot.cfg" #!mv /tmp_dir/boot.cfg.new /tmp_dir/boot.cfg
#Copy back the boot.cfg into the virtual disk copy-in /tmp_dir/boot.cfg /
!rm /tmp_dir/jumpstrt.gz !rm /tmp_dir/useropts.gz !rm /tmp_dir/boot.cfg
#Unmount for now to edit the boot.cfg on the local machine and later copy it back to the virtual disk umount /
# exit from guestfish exit
